20110113220207.000|20110113220209.000|TR0|eyes just days after a bullet tore through 
20110113220209.000|20110113220211.000|TR0|her brain.  Today, we heard from her

20110113220819.000|20110113220821.000|TR0|and the freedom of speech, the freedom of

20110113220853.000|20110113220855.000|TR0|there's agreement on all sides of the 
20110113220855.000|20110113220858.000|TR0|political spectrum.  Violence is never, 
20110113220858.000|20110113220900.000|TR0|ever acceptable.  We had people that died. 
20110113220900.000|20110113220902.000|TR0| We had people whose lives will be changed

20110113220936.000|20110113220939.000|TR0|paying a terrible price for abuse -- and I 
20110113220939.000|20110113220941.000|TR0|stress this -- abuse of their freedoms.  
20110113220941.000|20110113220943.000|TR0|This is what I was trying to say and this 
20110113220943.000|20110113220945.000|TR0|is what I was trying to ask about.
20110113220945.000|20110113220948.000|TR0|
20110113220948.000|20110113220950.000|TR0|BOLDUAN:  But one former State Department 
20110113220950.000|20110113220952.000|TR0|official who follows Russia closely says 
20110113220952.000|20110113220954.000|TR0|this isn't abuse shared by most abroad.
20110113220954.000|20110113220957.000|TR0|
20110113220957.000|20110113220959.000|TR0|HEATHER CONLEY, CENTER FOR STRATEGIC AND 
20110113220959.000|20110113221001.000|TR0|INTERNATIONAL STUDIES: The prevailing 
20110113221001.000|20110113221003.000|TR0|global reaction has been one of shock, one 
20110113221003.000|20110113221006.000|TR0|of sympathy. I think it is important to 
20110113221006.000|20110113221008.000|TR0|note that those who have anti-American 
20110113221008.000|20110113221010.000|TR0|views will use this tragedy as an example 
20110113221010.000|20110113221013.000|TR0|of -- of, in part, what America is -- is 
20110113221013.000|20110113221015.000|TR0|reaping what it has sowed through its -- 
20110113221015.000|20110113221017.000|TR0|its policies.  And, unfortunately, that's 
20110113221017.000|20110113221019.000|TR0|-- gratefully, it's a minority view.  
20110113221019.000|20110113221022.000|TR0|Unfortunately, there are some around the 
20110113221022.000|20110113221024.000|TR0|world that believe that.
20110113221024.000|20110113221026.000|TR0|
20110113221026.000|20110113221028.000|TR0|(END VIDEOTAPE)
20110113221028.000|20110113221031.000|TR0|
20110113221031.000|20110113221033.000|TR0|BOLDUAN:  And, Wolf, although you could

20110113221035.000|20110113221038.000|TR0|moment, I'm told not to expect, really,

20110113221044.000|20110113221047.000|TR0|

20110113221049.000|20110113221051.000|TR0|in Europe, but in Asia, in Africa, they

20110113221224.000|20110113221227.000|TR0|opportunity for Palin to reach beyond her

20110113221247.000|20110113221249.000|TR0|-- defiant, inflammatory.  Palin invoked

20110113221251.000|20110113221254.000|TR0|libel" in attacking the media.
20110113221254.000|20110113221256.000|TR0|

20110113222035.000|20110113222037.000|TR0|
20110113222037.000|20110113222039.000|TR0|Thanks very much.
20110113222039.000|20110113222041.000|TR0|
20110113222041.000|20110113222044.000|TR0|The usual partisan bickering has been on

20110113223004.000|20110113223007.000|TR0|actually seeing, that not only are the 
20110113223007.000|20110113223009.000|TR0|eyes open, but that messages are getting 
20110113223009.000|20110113223011.000|TR0|through to (INAUDIBLE)?

20110113223016.000|20110113223018.000|TR0|will say is we have seen the eyes begin to 
20110113223018.000|20110113223020.000|TR0|track.  So think about it.  When you first 
20110113223020.000|20110113223022.000|TR0|wake up in the morning, you're all

20110113223027.000|20110113223029.000|TR0|start to focus. We're just starting to see 
20110113223029.000|20110113223032.000|TR0|those signs and -- and her trying to track 
20110113223032.000|20110113223034.000|TR0|her gaze to wherever she wants to look.  
20110113223034.000|20110113223036.000|TR0|That's very, very encouraging.  Again, it

20110113223052.000|20110113223054.000|TR0|DR. PETER RHEE, MEDICAL DIRECTOR, UMC 
20110113223054.000|20110113223057.000|TR0|TRAUMA CENTER:  Well, so she still has the

20110113223101.000|20110113223103.000|TR0|her on the side of the bed, and so on, and 
20110113223103.000|20110113223106.000|TR0|hopefully, tomorrow, we'll get her up into 
20110113223106.000|20110113223108.000|TR0|a chair.  But she still has the tube in 
20110113223108.000|20110113223110.000|TR0|her throat.  She's still on the machine.
20110113223110.000|20110113223112.000|TR0|
20110113223112.000|20110113223115.000|TR0|But even though she's on the machine, the 
20110113223115.000|20110113223117.000|TR0|machine is not pushing her.  She's just 
20110113223117.000|20110113223119.000|TR0|breathing on her own with warm, humidified 
20110113223119.000|20110113223121.000|TR0|air that's going in there with very little 
20110113223121.000|20110113223124.000|TR0|support.
20110113223124.000|20110113223126.000|TR0|

20110113225559.000|20110113225602.000|TR0|he delivered his inaugural address on 
20110113225602.000|20110113225604.000|TR0|January 20th, 1961, his draft read, "Ask
